translated: Materiality is present there as the cause. The words â€œhe develops the wholesome statesâ€ and so on are the words of demonstration here. For â€œhe developsâ€ means he increases. But here the meaning is that he reaches, because of the mere fourfold materiality. â€œHe becomes thusâ€ means he becomes, he reaches, this kind of. But the words â€œhe becomes eyeâ€ and so on are stated in the commentaries and subcommentaries on the basis of the two sets of two elements, namely, â€œbhÅ« is being and bhÅ« is reachingâ€ . We shall explain their meaning for the purpose of skill in the scriptures. Herein, he becomes eye is the eye that has become the eye for the world by turning to the function of seeing, because it is the means for seeing things as they really are. Or alternatively, he becomes eye is the eye that has become like the eye. Or he becomes eye because he has reached the eye that is the eye of knowledge by means of his own knowledge that is self-become. He becomes knowledge is the knowledge that has become the knowledge of the world by turning to the function of knowing. Or alternatively, he becomes knowledge is the knowledge that has become like knowledge. Or he becomes knowledge because he has reached the knowledge that is the eye of knowledge by means of his own knowledge that is self-become. He becomes the maker of what is known is the maker of what is known by becoming the maker of what is known in the world by turning to the function of making known.
